title: Textile, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: damassé (10-harness satin plus 9/1 twill with paired warps)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 60.5 x 27 cm (23 13/16 x 10 5/8 in.)
description: Fragment of a large scale symmetrical pattern reversed on the center line of the textile. An urn with flowers placed in offset rows connected by a curving vine (almost an ogee framework) having grape vines and heads of wheat. Background is a dull salmon and the pattern is yellow twill. Intact selvage on right side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: damassé (10-harness satin plus 9/1 twill with paired warps). 1971-91-6.
